subtasks: Gather materials (cattle panels, shade cloth, zip ties, cedar 2x4s)
Measure and cut materials to size
Assemble frame with cedar 2x4s
Attach cattle panels to the frame
Secure shade cloth with zip ties
Position structure over chicken area
Inspect and adjust placement for optimal shade
Observe bird behavior and activity
Adjust structure as needed for temperature changes
Check materials for damage or wear
Repair or replace any damaged components
Clean structure periodically to prevent buildup
Monitor for pest or animal intrusion
